Waarp Gateway Ftp 2.1.0 API Reference

The Waarp Gateway FTP project is a Full Waarp FTP Server with Executor (Gateway) support as Waarp Project: this is an extension of Waarp FTP server with execution support at the end of a transfer.

See:
          Description


Waarp Gateway Ftp Utils package
org.waarp.gateway.ftp.utils  

 

Other Packages
org.waarp.ftp.exec Main class for the Exec FTP server based on Filesystem and simple authentication.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.adminssl Classes implementing HTTPS Administration support
org.waarp.ftp.exec.config Exec configuration.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.control Exec FTP server control business.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.data Exec FTP server data business.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.database Classes implementing Database access
org.waarp.ftp.exec.database.data Classes implementing Database Data model
org.waarp.ftp.exec.database.model Classes implementing Database Model (H2, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
org.waarp.ftp.exec.exec Class for the real Exec for this Waarp FTP Exec server.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.file Filesystem based implementation of File, Dir, Auth and SimpleAuth.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.snmp SNMP support classes.
org.waarp.ftp.exec.utils Utility classes.

 

The Waarp Gateway FTP project is a Full Waarp FTP Server with Executor (Gateway) support as Waarp Project: this is an extension of Waarp FTP server with execution support at the end of a transfer.
